title: iOS Developer

company.name: Webhelp Morocco
company.description: Global leader in customer experience and digital services

description: We're looking for an experienced iOS Developer to develop high-quality mobile applications. You will be responsible for the entire mobile app lifecycle, from concept to deployment and maintenance.
responsibilities: Develop native or cross-platform mobile applications
Implement mobile UI/UX following platform guidelines
Optimize app performance and battery usage
Handle app store submissions and updates
Integrate with backend APIs and third-party services
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
